prompts: Create a Pokemon with electric powers and a sleek green body, featuring glowing accents.
Show me a small, energetic creature that can harness electricity, resembling a playful dog.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in forests and grasslands, with bright colors and dynamic features.
Design an agile, quadruped Pokemon with a striking yellow highlight and a mischievous expression.
Generate a cute electric-type Pokemon that is full of energy and loves to play in nature.
Give me an adorable Pokemon that has a unique green color and can run very fast.
Make a compact, electric-type Pokemon that can easily navigate through urban environments.
